entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ArgumentException thrown when building queries involving owned entities mapped with .ToJson() #33046
  • Use inheritance instead of annotations for TableExpressionBase (specifically temporal tables) #33044
  • DbSet.Add causes failure if called after lazy loading related entity #33041
  • EF Core 8.0.1 regression: an entity with a primary key in another collation returns invalid results for trivial queries. #33040
  • Migrations: when adding required column with custom converter and unspecified default value to existing table, we don't pass through converter to generate the default "empty" value #33038
  • Owned type's shadow key size should match that of owner's PK #33037
  • Performance implications of Projections which result in unnecessary casts #33036
  • I need a setting or option to store all the enums as string in database including the enum columns or enums inside the json columns (even if they are at root of the json or multi level in depth due to complexity of json) #33035

Closed

  • EF Core 8.0.1 query with where Contains ( xx in zzzz) create error SqlException (0x80131904): #33045
  • Stack Overflow Error in .NET 8.0 in EF Core with Large Table #32971
    9.0.0-preview1
  • An issue with query filtering and aggregation, after upgrading from 6.0.0 to 6.0.16 #33001
  • ValueConverters do not detect changes when using ChangeTrackingProxies / ChangedAndChangingNotifications #32992

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #33047
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Fix to #32972 - The database default created by Migrations for primitive collections mapped to JSON is invalid #33039

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Update SqlClient dependency #33043
    tell-mode, 8.0.3
  • [release/7.0] Update SqlClient dependency #33042
    tell-mode, 7.0.17
